channel.title: Core is not working out too well
channel.description:
its getting annoying that core only records the last person to place/break something, and also core doesnt record who interacts with a block (opening a chest or door)
we need to use something else, hawk tool worked decent but there is still the issue of it not recording certain players
and has there been any update to big brother?

item.title: Core is not working out too well
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’ve not noticed any issues up to now, so I suspect so. But it only started having issues when huge amounts of griefing were performed.

Read full topic
item.source: Core is not working out too well

item.title: Core is not working out too well
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Still doesn’t look like there are any good options, (everyone recommends coreprotect), so I guess we are stuck with it for now. Maybe upgrading craftbukkit itself has fixed it?

Read full topic
